symptom.tree2table: SELECT `data_attr_data`.`pid` as `pid`,`p_data_attr_data`.`data` as `pd`, `data_attr_data`.`sid` as `mid`,`data_attr_data`.`data` as `md` FROM `data_attr_data` LEFT JOIN `data_attr_data` `p_data_attr_data` ON `data_attr_data`.`pid` = `p_data_attr_data`.`sid` WHERE `data_attr_data`.`metaid` = 4 AND `data_attr_data`.`grp` = 2;
symptom.getInfoes: SELECT `data_attr_data`.*,`data_attr_meta`.`level` FROM `data_attr_data` LEFT JOIN `data_attr_meta` ON `data_attr_data`.`metaid` = `data_attr_meta`.`sid` WHERE `data_attr_data`.`grp` = 2 AND `data_attr_data`.`pid` = :pid
symptom.getLvById: SELECT `data_attr_meta`.`level` FROM `data_attr_data` LEFT JOIN `data_attr_meta` ON `data_attr_data`.`metaid` = `data_attr_meta`.`sid` WHERE `data_attr_data`.`sid` = :sid AND `data_attr_data`.`grp` = 2;

meta.getInfoesByGrp: SELECT * FROM `data_attr_meta` WHERE `grp` = 2 ORDER BY `level` ASC
